峺字的基本解释

峺
gěng
山岭险阻处：“五里，南踰一石山脊，亦置隘门，是名峺腋。”

峺字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gěng］
［《集韻》古杏切，上梗，見。］
山岭险阻处。

峺字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　峺； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页312第11
【集韻】古杏切，音梗。礙也。　【正字通】俗硬字。集韻硬或作峺，不必从字彙峺硬分爲二。

峺字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
峺字的起名意思

暂无。

峺
Basic explanation of words
峺
gěng
The dangerous place of the mountain: "Five miles, more than a stone ridge to the south, and also set up a gate, which is the name of the axillary."
峺
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［gěng］
["Ji Yun" ancient apricot cut, top stem, see. ]
The mountain is dangerous.
峺
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　峺; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 312 11
[Jiyun] Ancient apricot cut, sound stem. Hinder also.　【Zhengzitong】vulgar hard characters. It is not necessary to divide the rhyme hard or Zuo 峺 from the word Hui 峺.
